text: Across the Wide Missouri is a 1951 American western movie directed by William A. Wellman and was based on the 1947 novel of the same name by Bernard DeVoto. It stars Clark Gable, Ricardo Montalb√°n, John Hodiak, Adolphe Menjou, J. Carrol Naish, Alan Napier, George Chandler, Richard Anderson, James Whitmore, Howard Keel and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1951 movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by William A. Wellman Category:Movies set in Colorado Category:Movies set in Idaho Category:Movies set in Montana Category:Movies set in the 1820s Category:Movies set in the 1830s
title: Across the Wide Missouri (movie)
